availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jessie McMahan and Eleanor McMahan Henderson. Married Elizabeth Ellen Peddicord McMahan in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 465. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 74. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Berlin, p. 22. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Bracken County, 1860, film no. 000344097.
